setting.location: Personal quarters and common areas aboard research station orbiting planet Solaris
setting.weather: Artificial atmosphere with unusual pressure variations

characters.appearance: Man, early 30s, brown hair uncombed, tired eyes, movements lacking usual precision
characters.clothing: Station uniform hastily put on, slightly wrinkled, collar askew
characters.position: Standing in doorway between quarters and corridor, hesitating
characters.action: Pausing uncertainly, looking down corridor as if expecting something, hand resting on door frame for psychological support

scene.mainElements: Doorway threshold between private and public space, corridor extending in both directions, subtle signs of changed routine and disrupted normalcy
scene.details: Door frame showing wear patterns from hands gripping it, floor showing irregular cleaning patterns, lighting slightly dimmer than previous days, personal items visible in quarters behind character, no text or letters visible
scene.background: Corridor with fewer normal activity sounds, shadows seeming deeper, sense of emptiness where there should be routine bustle, mechanical sounds more noticeable in the quiet
scene.atmosphere: Broken routine, increasing paranoia, sense that normal patterns have been fundamentally disrupted, growing awareness that this assignment is not what was expected

composition.cameraAngle: Medium shot from corridor looking toward character in doorway
composition.depth: Character silhouetted in doorway, quarters visible behind in middle ground, corridor extending into background uncertainty

colorPalette.usageNotes: Cool tones dominate with pops of vibrant neon lighting

lineArt.texture: smooth digital, hard edges on tech

lighting.intensity: high contrast (bright neon vs deep shadow)
lighting.highlights: lens flares, neon glows on surfaces

rendering.texture: smooth with textured brushes for atmosphere
rendering.detailLevel: high in focal points (tech details), looser elsewhere

perspective: dynamic perspective (wide-angle vistas or low-angle hero shots)
